column3: Go to the DOAJ admin journal search at /publisher/
Open the In DOAJ facet, and select "False"

column4: None of the journal titles in the search results are links
In DOAJ: No metadata is present
All the journal titles in the search results are links
In DOAJ: Yes metadata is present
You are taken to the DOAJ ToC page for this journal

column3: Click back (twice) in your browser window to go back to the search results
Click on the "Hope page" URL for a journal result

column4: You are taken to the Journal's home page

column3: Click back in your browser winder to go back to the search results
Select one of the CC licences from this facet

column4: All the journal results show the relevant CC icon under the metadata field "License"

column3: Click on the View current update request link at the bottom right of any journal

column4: You are taken to Update Requests tab with this journal id search filter on (journal's id in the search fields is on and only related records are shown)
